languages.text: Лорд-капитан предпоч{mf|ел|ла} не появляться в опасном месте лично. Однако Наместник рассчитывает, что после смерти последнего заболевшего зону можно безопасно дезинфицировать.
The Lord Captain decided against going to the dangerous location in person. However, the Liege believes that after the death of the last victim, the area can be safely disinfected.
languages.original_text: Лорд-капитан предпоч{mf|ел|ла} не появляться в опасном месте лично. Однако Наместник рассчитывает, что после смерти последнего заболевшего зону можно безопасно дезинфицировать.

traits.locale_text: The Lord Captain decided against going to the dangerous location in person. However, the Liege believes that after the death of the last victim, the area can be safely disinfected.
The Lord Captain decided against going to the dangerous location in person. However, the Liege believes that after the death of the last victim, the area can be safely disinfected.
The Lord Captain decided against going to the dangerous location in person. However, the Liege believes that after the death of the last victim, the area can be safely disinfected.
The Lord Captain decided against going to the dangerous location in person. However, the Liege believes that after the death of the last victim, the area can be safely disinfected.

languages.text: 领主舰长认为无须亲自前往危险地点。总督认为，等到最后一名受害者也死了之后，就可以安全地对这片区域进行消杀了。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain decided against going to the dangerous location in person. However, the Liege believes that after the death of the last victim, the area can be safely disinfected.

traits.locale_text: 领主舰长认为无须亲自前往危险地点。总督认为，等到最后一名受害者也死了之后，就可以安全地对这片区域进行消杀了。

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンは危険な場所には出向かないことに決めたが、領主は最後の犠牲者が死んだ後であれば、その地域は安全に消毒できると信じている。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain decided against going to the dangerous location in person. However, the Liege believes that after the death of the last victim, the area can be safely disinfected.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンは危険な場所には出向かないことに決めたが、領主は最後の犠牲者が死んだ後であれば、その地域は安全に消毒できると信じている。

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán ha decidido no visitar en persona un lugar tan peligroso. Sin embargo, el señor cree que, tras la muerte de la última víctima, es seguro desinfectar la zona.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain decided against going to the dangerous location in person. However, the Liege believes that after the death of the last victim, the area can be safely disinfected.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán ha decidido no visitar en persona un lugar tan peligroso. Sin embargo, el señor cree que, tras la muerte de la última víctima, es seguro desinfectar la zona.

languages.text: Der Lord Captain hat sich entschlossen, den gefährlichen Ort nicht selbst aufzusuchen. Allerdings denkt der Lehnsherr, das der Bereich nach dem Tod des letzten Opfers gefahrlos desinfiziert werden kann.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain decided against going to the dangerous location in person. However, the Liege believes that after the death of the last victim, the area can be safely disinfected.

traits.locale_text: Der Lord Captain hat sich entschlossen, den gefährlichen Ort nicht selbst aufzusuchen. Allerdings denkt der Lehnsherr, das der Bereich nach dem Tod des letzten Opfers gefahrlos desinfiziert werden kann.

languages.text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} a décidé de ne pas se rendre en personne dans ce lieu dangereux. Toutefois, le suzerain estime qu'après la mort de la dernière victime, la zone pourra être désinfectée.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain decided against going to the dangerous location in person. However, the Liege believes that after the death of the last victim, the area can be safely disinfected.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} a décidé de ne pas se rendre en personne dans ce lieu dangereux. Toutefois, le suzerain estime qu'après la mort de la dernière victime, la zone pourra être désinfectée.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan, tehlikeli bölgeye bizzat gitmeme kararı aldı. Emîr ise son kurbanın ölümünün ardından bölgenin güvenle dezenfekte edilebileceğine inanıyor.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain decided against going to the dangerous location in person. However, the Liege believes that after the death of the last victim, the area can be safely disinfected.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan tehlikeli bölgeye bizzat gitmeme kararı aldı ancak Emîr, son kurbanın ölümünün ardından bölgenin güvenle dezenfekte edilebileceğine inanıyor.
